final_result:
PH::make_coin(C,PH).
coin(C) :- make_coin(C,0.8).
coins_r(SC,SC,0).
coins_r(SC,S,CNT) :-
 CNT > 0,
 
CNT1 is CNT - 1,
    (coin(CNT) ->
        SC1 is SC + 1,
        coins_r(SC1,S,CNT1)
    ;
        coins_r(SC,S,CNT1)
    )
.
total(S) :- coins_r(0,S,4).
query(total(_)).
final_report: The generated code is not correct due to a syntax error in the Problog implementation. The use of '->' operator is not valid in this context, leading to an 'UnknownClause' error.
